narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Ease-e Medical Inc. is a Durable Medical Equipment & Medical Supplies provider based in Canon City, CO. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $16.0M in Medicaid payments across 234K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $16.0M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
